com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote

Class BasicUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote.UserSession
      • com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote.BasicUserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArtifactViewerFunctionalities, BasicUserManagerInterface, CourseViewerFunctionalities, DeliverableViewerFunctionalities, ProjectViewerFunctionalities, TeamViewerFunctionalities, UserEditingFunctionalities, UserLoginFunctionalities, UserSessionInterface, UserViewerFunctionalities
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdministratorManager, ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    public abstract class BasicUserManager
extends UserSession
implements BasicUserManagerInterface
    This abstract class provides the reuse of code for the ProfessorManager and StudentManager stateful session bean for all of the common methods implemented by both the managers.

                  UserDoesNotExistException,
                  PasswordMismatchException
        Description copied from interface: UserLoginFunctionalities
        Log into the MPH system the user identified by the username given as parameter
        Specified by:
        login in interface UserLoginFunctionalities
        Parameters:
        theUsername - the username
        thePasswordHash - the hash of the user password
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserDoesNotExistException - if the username given as parameter is not registered into the system
        PasswordMismatchException - if the hash given as parameter does not match with the one saved into the database
        AlreadyLoggedInException
